plays.text: Penalty to Ossi Vaananen 2 minutes for Crosschecking Marco Sturm
Goal scored by Vincent Damphousse assisted by Owen Nolan and Gary Suter
Penalty to Ladislav Nagy 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Evgeni Nabokov
Penalty to Scott Hannan 2 minutes for Interference Shane Doan
Penalty to Todd Harvey 2 minutes for Slashing Ladislav Nagy
Penalty to Marcus Ragnarsson 2 minutes for Crosschecking Landon Wilson
Goal scored by Daniel Briere assisted by Dan Focht and Daymond Langkow
Goal scored by Patrick Marleau assisted by Teemu Selanne and Bryan Marchment
Penalty to Niklas Sundstrom 2 minutes for Tripping Paul Mara
Penalty to Michal Handzus 2 minutes for Interference Teemu Selanne
Penalty to Mike Rathje 2 minutes for Tripping Ladislav Nagy
Penalty to Drake Berehowsky 2 minutes for Interference Mike Ricci
Penalty to Ladislav Nagy 5 minutes for Boarding Marco Sturm
Penalty to Ladislav Nagy 10 minutes for Game Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Todd Harvey 2 minutes for High Sticking Todd Simpson
Penalty to Todd Harvey 2 minutes for High Sticking Todd Simpson
Penalty to Brad Stuart 2 minutes for Roughing Shane Doan
Penalty to Shane Doan 2 minutes for Elbowing Brad Stuart
Penalty to Mike Johnson 2 minutes for Interference Mike Ricci
